parameters.description: The day in UTC format to get deletion request list after that. format : YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: The day in UTC format to get deletion request list before that. format : YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: the maximum number of data that may be returned (1...100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The day in UTC of the deletion request. format : YYYY-MM-DD. Default : today time in UTC.
parameters.name: requestDate

get.summary: Retrieve all user's account deletion requests in specified date

delete.description:
Delete a list of admin email addresses to stop receiving personal data request notification. 
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:EMAIL:CONFIGURATION [DELETE]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

parameters.description: list of admin email to delete
parameters.name: emails

get.description:
Get list of admin email address configuration. 
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:EMAIL:CONFIGURATION [READ]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

post.description:
Add admin email address for receiving personal data request notification. 
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:EMAIL:CONFIGURATION [CREATE]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

put.description: Update admin email address for receiving personal data request notification. <p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:EMAIL:CONFIGURATION [UPDATE]</code></p>

parameters.description: the maximum number of data that may be returned (1...100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: request date with format YYYY-MM-DD. Default value today UTC
parameters.name: requestDate

get.description:
Get Registered Services Configuration.
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:GDPR:CONFIGURATION [READ]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

put.description:
Update Registered Services Configuration.
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:GDPR:CONFIGURATION [UPDATE]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

delete.description:
<b>[TEST FACILITY ONLY]</b><br/>Reset Registered Services Configuration to use the default configuration.
			<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:GDPR:CONFIGURATION [DELETE]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>

get.summary: Retrieve specific user's account deletion request

parameters.description: the maximum number of data that may be returned (1...100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
<p>Required permission <code>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:INFORMATION:USER:{userId} [CREATE]</code> and scope <code>account</code></p>
<p>If admin request data for themselves, password is need to be set</p>
post.summary: Submit user personal data retrieval request

post.description: <p>Requires valid user access token and password

get.summary: Retrieve specific user's account deletion status

parameters.description: the maximum number of data that may be returned (1...100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

post.description:
<p>Requires valid user access token<br>
		This is for in-game only and require a valid platformId and platform token. If a full account is not logged by 3rd platform, then please use <a href='#operations-Data_Deletion-PublicSubmitUserAccountDeletionRequest'>/gdpr/public/namespaces/{namespace}/users/{userId}/deletions</a>

parameters.description: Platform ID which used to generate current token
parameters.name: platformId

parameters.description: Platform token of current logged platform
parameters.name: platformToken

url.description: url of the service with port number

extendConfig.description: extend configuration detail, required when "type" is "EXTEND"

serviceConfig.description: service configuration detail, required when "type" is "SERVICE"
